channel.title: Z on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in Z on VitaminDWiki

item.title: T-cell and Vitamin D - many studies
History of Vitamin D:1650 to present
item.description:
• Historical aspects of vitamin D.
      • Introduction
      • 1650-1890: History of vitamin D Deficiency (Rickets)
      • 1890-1930: History of the discovery of vitamin D and its structural elucidation
      • 1930-1975: History of the discovery of vitamin D metabolites including 1,25-(OH)?D3
      • 1975-Present: History of the discovery of the vitamin D cellular machinery, functions and vitamin D-related human diseases.
      • Conclusions
      • 5 Vitamin D history tables

Historical aspects of vitamin D.

2022 Mar 1;EC-21-0594. doi: 10.1530/EC-21-0594.

Glenville Jones

item.title: How to view PDF on a small screen
item.description:
PDFs are normally very hard to read on small screens

Adobe Acrobat uses artificial intelligence to reformat a PDF for a small screen

First install free Adobe Acrobat Reader

Then, for each PDF, you:

  1. Download the PDF to your device

  2. Open Adobe Acrobat

  3. Select the PDF

  4. Click on drop icon at the top

item.title: PDF translation
item.description:
1. Download the PDF file to your computer

  2. Go to Google Translate Documents

  3. Find the PDF file on your computer(Must be shorter than 10MB as of July 2021)

  4. Select the language to translate to

  5. Click on TRANSLATE

Google does a pretty good job.

Occasionally the translated line is longer than original, so the lines in 2 columns will overlap

The result is difficult to read on small screens (smartphone)

item.title: COVID-19 lung infection upsets Vitamin D genes (so more or different form of Vit D is required)
VitaminDWiki: the first 10 years, the next 10 years
item.description:
The first 10 years:

VitaminDWiki was started Dec 2009

As of Jan 2020, it has 11,000 page and 13,000 files, has taken 15,000 hours to create and has been seen 6 million times

Currently, it appears likely that:

  • Vitamin D levels in tissues will continue to drop for 4 reasons:

      1. Less vitamin D from the sun,
      1. Less from food,
      1. Fewer nutrients which are needed for Vit D,
      1. Vitamin D Receptors have become less activated

  • People with poor immune systems have been surviving and passing on their poor genes

item.title: Google “supplements are” and get implication that supplements are BAD
item.description:
INVESTIGATION: Google Manipulates Search Suggestions To Promote Pharma, Discredit Natural Health GreenMed Info

There appears to be a major change in Google’s suggestions in June 2019

“… Google’s suggestions are the opposite of what most people are actually searching for on the internet today.”

Google TRENDS shows that people actually Search for Supplements are GOOD 3X as often as Supplements are BAD

Likewise: Google GMOs are

Likewise: Google Organics is

item.title: Search in your language
item.description:
A Chrome Browser add-on allows search in another language

Installation of search translator

  1. Download Google Input Tools

  2. Install the browser add-on

  3. Select keyboard and/or /touchscreen input (such as Spanish)

Use of the search translator

  1. Select language in the upper right of any page

  2. Select search translator icon

  1. Select Language/dialect and keyboard/touchscreen

Notes

  1. You may have to turn off this search translator on some other websites

  2. The search translator (Google input Tools) also allows you to create keyboard shortcuts

item.title: Top Charts
item.description:
For details, just click on the chart

      • Long-COVID a month or two shorter if more than 20 ng of Vitamin D
      • Increased D, Increased perceived health
      • Ensure a healthy pregnancy and baby - take Vitamin D before conception
      • Vitamin D is the 3rd best way to improve your health (but the most cost-effective and easiest)
      • Vitamin D blood test misses a lot due to genes
      • No benefit from Vitamin D if too small of a dose or for too short of time
      • Back/leg pain lasted 1 year longer if low vitamin D
      • Meta-meta analysis of Vitamin D
      • Influenza -A infections half as often in children if got even 1200 IU of Vitamin D – RCT
      • Variety of evidence that Vitamin D helps the BRAIN
      • Death rate 2X higher if low D - even for non-elderly
      • Many ways to increase Vitamin D
      • Vitamin D levels around the world - 2014
      • Map of Vitamin D levels - 2001
      • 400,000 IU loading dose: feel the benefits in < 7 days
      • Pre-term birth costs $51,800 (vs. very little vitamin D to prevent one: 10% of births are pre-term)
      • $10,000 higher VA hospital costs if have low Vitamin D
      • Huge decrease in many pregnancy problems as increase vitamin D
      • Huge decrease in many health problems as increase vitamin D
      • 35,000 IU reduced Psorasis
      • Evolution seems to indicate a vitamin D level of 45-60 ng
      • Risk Factors for Vitamin D Deficiency
      • Many Vicious loops: low D ==> diseases ==> lower D
      • Reductions before Vitamin D gets to the cells
      • Large differences in the response to Vitamin D (summary of 36 studies)
      • Recommendations around the world
      • High percentage of populations have < 20 ng
      • Is Toxic only if you take a LOT of vitamin D for many weeks
      • Less sun ==> Less Vitamin D ==> Less Health
      • Seniors get less benefit from UV
      • Variability between results from blood on same type of tester
      • Incidence of 30 health problems related to vitamin D has doubled in a decade
      • Search ALL charts in VitaminDWiki

Long-COVID a month or two shorter if more than 20 ng of Vitamin D

Increased D, Increased perceived health

Ensure a healthy pregnancy and baby - take Vitamin D before conception

Text in image (for translation): 39 weeks, Miscarry, Start 20 weeks, Start 10 weeks, Loading dose start 2 weeks, Start 8 weeks BEFORE conception

item.title: Vitamin D Receptor gene relationship to lower back pain – study funded
item.description:
Evaluation of the frequency of polymorphisms of Vitamin D receptor gene(VDR) as a risk factor in the etiology of disc degeneration

Principal Investigator: Luciano Miller Reis Rodrigues

Awardee: Luciano Miller Reis Rodrigues

Institution: Faculdade de Medicina do ABC. Organização Social de Saúde. Fundação do ABC. Santo André, SP, Brazil

Field of knowledge: Health Sciences - Medicine

Support type: Regular Research Awards

Grant number: 13/00902-4

Duration: June 01, 2013 - May 31, 2015
